articles.caption: A look at Voyager Finance's Buy Now Pay Later for NFTs!  By the homie @_calmdonut
articles.title: Searching for Alpha: Voyage Finance and NFTPerp
articles.description: The NFT market has decelerated, with cumulative volume traded across marketplaces down more than 90% year-to-date. Regardless, the drawdown does not stop Searching for Alpha is a series that summarizes under-the-radar protocols that The Block Research team finds interesting.¬†This week's series will focus on two protocols: Voyage Finance and NFTPerp, which are both still in closed beta testing. The former is bringing Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) to the NFT space, thereby increasing access to blue-chip NFTs. Meanwhile, the latter enables traders to speculate on the floor price of blue-chip NFTs without the need for liquidity providers.
